/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The road itself is lined with trees on both sides, their green leaves contrasting with the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and creating a lens flare effect in the image. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out against the gray of the road. In the distance, buildings can be seen, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise natural landscape. The image does not provide any specific details that could be used to identify the exact location within Beijing.
